General.Name: Unictron Technologies Corp
General.Description: Unictron Technologies Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells antennas, antenna modules, and piezoelectric ceramic elements for use in various electronic devices in Taiwan, the United States, China, and internationally. The company provides antennas, such as chip, external, internal, other embedded, PCB/ FPC, and patch antennas for use in cellular telecommunications, consumer electronics, healthcare, high precision positioning, marine electronics, navigation and tracking, networking, routers and wireless set top box, security and safety, time synchronization, utilities, wearables, as well as smart cities, homes, offices and factories, transportation, and metering applications ; internal antenna modules; and trackers and receivers. It also offers piezoelectric ceramic element for level sensors, bending actuators, energy harvesting, flow meters, dental scalers, speakers and sounders, proximity and distance sensors, haptic devices, nebulizer/automizer/humidifier, feeder and vibration mechanisms, miniature precision pumps, automotive backup sensors, anti-vibration, and ultrasonic cleaning, welding, and machining applications. In addition, the company provides ultrasonic transducers, including air and liquid transducers for level detection, edge position control, proximity measurement, ultrasonic flow meter, and double feed detection applications; and protection components comprising transient voltage suppressors, electrostatic discharge protection devices, metal oxide varistors, gas discharge tubes, spark gap protectors, thyristor surge suppressors, polymer positive temperature coefficient, chip fuse, and negative power thermistor. Unictron Technologies Corporation was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Taoyuan, Taiwan.
